meanings.definition: A person's sense of self-esteem or self-importance.
meanings.sent1: Her ego was boosted when she received praise for her artwork.
meanings.sent2: His ego was hurt when he didn't get the promotion he wanted.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, the ant had a big ego and acted like he ruled the anthill.
meanings.sent4: His ego was a fragile glass sculpture, easily shattered by criticism.
meanings.sent5: The ego of the lion made it believe it was the king of the jungle.

meanings.definition: The conscious mind, as opposed to the unconscious.
meanings.sent1: In his ego, he made the decision to study late into the night.
meanings.sent2: Her ego was fully aware of the risks involved in the adventure.
meanings.sent3: The ego of the computer was constantly processing information, never resting.
meanings.sent4: His ego was a bright spotlight in the darkness of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The ego of the detective carefully analyzed every clue in the case.

meanings.sent1: His ego was so big that he believed he was the best at everything.
meanings.sent2: The singer's ego led her to demand special treatment backstage.
meanings.sent3: The ego of the cat made it think it deserved a throne made of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Her ego was a towering mountain casting a shadow over those around her.
meanings.sent5: The ego of the politician was like a hot air balloon, full of empty promises.
